title: Expanding Neuro-Symbolic Artificial Intelligence for Strategic Learning
venue: Santa Clara University Computer Science and Engineering Senior Theses
excerpt: This thesis seeks to find ways to determine if hybrid AI are more capable of learning high-level strategy than traditional reinforcement learning methods.
citation: Clay, Dorian. (2022). "Expanding Neuro-Symbolic Artificial Intelligence for Strategic Learning" Santa Clara University Computer Science and Engineering Senior Theses.

title: Expanding Neuro-Symbolic AI for Strategic Learning
excerpt: Today, artificial intelligence (AI) solves problems as varied as driving cars to diagnosing diseases. However, it still has significant pitfalls. This paper will seek to apply neuro-symbolic AI to strategic game play where AI agents have the same information as a human playerâ€”just an image.
